articles.title: Huawei starts sales of new Pura 70 smartphone amid scrutiny on chips - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese technology giant Huawei started selling two models of its highly anticipated, high-end Pura 70 smartphone series on Thursday that many analysts expect to contain an advanced China-made chip like its Mate 60 handset.
